amendment.description: Amendment to the Young (AK) substitute amendment (A001) requires the Secretary of Commerce, in consultation with the Secretary of Energy, to recommend to the President appropriate action to be taken against any person found to be engaged in anti-competitive activities in the exporting of crude oil under the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not printed in the Congressional Record, to the Young (AK) substitute, to require the Secretary of Commerce, in consultation with the Secretary of Energy, to recommend to the President appropriate action to be taken against any person found to be engaged in anti-competitive activities in the exporting crude oil under the provisions of the bill.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Traficant to the Young (AK) amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
